metadata.title: CVE-2022-4910 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Autofill in Google Chrome prior to107.0.5304.62 allowed a remote attacker to bypass navigation restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
